description: Create a material site reading summary.
permissions: User must be authenticated (persisted) to create material site reading summaries.
validation_notes: Required filters: material_site, material_site_measure, reading_at_min, reading_at_max. reading_at_min and reading_at_max must parse as times. Window (reading_at_max - reading_at_min) must be positive and <= 1 day (86400 seconds). Filters cannot have blank values. group-by entries must be valid summary attributes; invalid values raise an invalid field error. filters keys must be valid summary attribute filters; invalid keys raise an invalid field error. included-metrics must be valid metric names; invalid values raise an invalid field error. sort fields must reference valid summary columns.

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be key=value; key cannot be blank.

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to minute unless set.
flags.validation: Allowed values: minute, five_minute, ten_minute, quarter_hour, half_hour, hour, material_site, material_site_measure, material_site_reading_material_type, material_site_reading_material_type_presence.
